column4: Hey, Which is better banshee or rhythmbox? I currently use rhythmbox, is there any good reason to switch?
there is no better or best
its an opinion so is not concrete, why not just try the other player to see which you like
yes, but the only pros and cons threads in the forums (that I found) were really old. They look really similar in interface
like I said, there is no "better"
I just want to know what are the pros and cons of each
which is better, coke or pepsi?
i like pepsi, its all opinion, neither is better than the other
right, but do you know where I can get a list of objective pros and cons?
you can have both installed, see which you like after a long test and then choose that
developers website will list the features of both, you can see which matches your needs closer
I got timidity, installed it, but it's giving me trouble
that's great and all, but my problem is that it doesn't play nice with ALSA
or at all for that matter
omg I feel so stupid right now... I forgot to uncomment the configuration that tells it to use alsa -_-
you got the gold at least dude :D
